title: Bitcoin ($BTC) Whales and Big Money Still on ‘Risk-On Mode’, Analyst Says
description: In the volatile cryptocurrency market, understanding investor sentiment can be a crucial, yet tricky source of information. The CEO and co-founder of CryptoQuant, Ki Young Ju, has recently suggested large investors are still engaging with the market with a “risk-on mode.” According to a post Ki Young Ju shared in the microblogging platform X (formerly […]
